mapper.select: select g.game_id GameId, g.common_name GameName, z.mode mode from mug_game g left join ( select m.game_id, GROUP_CONCAT( m.mode_name order by m.inx ) mode from mug_mode m group by m.game_id ) z on g.game_id = z.game_id
select m.mode_id ModeId, m.game_id GameId, m.mode_name ModeName, m.inx Inx from mug_mode m where m.game_id = #{gameId} order by m.inx
